argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | muld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | addcomd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | addcand.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_addcan | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A + B ) = ( A + C ) <-> B = C ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = ( A + C ) <-> B = C ) ) |
